title: Margherita Pizza
description: Classic pizza with tomato sauce, mozzarella cheese, and fresh basil leaves.

title: Spaghetti Carbonara
description: Pasta dish made with spaghetti, eggs, parmesan cheese, bacon, and black pepper.

title: Chicken Parmigiana
description: Breaded chicken breast topped with tomato sauce and melted mozzarella cheese, served with spaghetti.

title: Linguine alle Vongole
description: Pasta dish made with linguine, clams, garlic, white wine, and parsley.

title: Osso Buco alla Milanese
description: Veal shanks braised with vegetables, white wine, and broth, served with saffron risotto.
